column2: the customer service was well above and beyond anything I've experienced in a long time.  We were  Second
column3: food was brought out quickly and tasted very good.  The pizzas ordered (a medium Lou and a medium pepperoni and mushroom) were cooked to perfection.  Nice
column6: yeasty crust with a hint of sweet mixed in with the sour
column7: topped with a thin layer of cheese and nice
column8: fat crushed tomatoes as a base.  The Lou is a grand tasting pizza
column9: but Lou's also does the basics very well.  The pepperoni was tasty and the mushrooms were cooked well and not soggy in the least.  I'm actually surprised at how well the pizzas were done.
